content:
Hey Folks,

We have recently created a new project in collaboration with the rust compiler team to introduce a semantically-versioned definition for MIR that tool developers could use to interface with rustc. Discussions relevant to this project will be hosted here: #project-stable-mir.

I created a topic to start gathering requirements from different tools: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/320896-project-stable-mir/topic/Current.20use.20cases.20of.20rustc.20MIR

It would be amazing if you can add any relevant information there about the tools you've been working on.

Thanks!
